name: Residence Inn Jacksonville Butler Boulevard

reviews.text: the duration of my trips are always long. So I tend to stay in the extended stay type hotels, with some exceptioms. All properties despite sharing the same brand name vary considerably.
reviews.title: A review from your extended stay business traveler

reviews.text: This Residence Inn is mostly average. It's an outdoor type but with locked hallways in each building. The room amenities and layout looks as if it was built in the early 90s. It is a nice property. The pool and the inner walk ways well maintained. the location is fairly close to an outdoor modern shopping mall complex. But not walking distance like another chain is.
reviews.title: Beware of Mold

reviews.text: When i checked in my room had CRT TV's. Days later to my pleasant surprise I came back from work and I had TWO 40inch flat screens with remoted waiting for me. That's two 40inches! Very nice. If you are into your TV you can't go wrong with this hotel. Now if they could get more channels on their cable line up.
reviews.title: Needs remodeling

reviews.text: The breakfast is good and hosted well. The evening meals could at times offer a little more volume in their main entree.
reviews.title: Don't Stay Here

reviews.text: Their internet service is below average but not awful like some hotels.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Had to stay here for a work trip and was a little anxious as some of the reviews indicated the hotel was run down. I also saw on the hotel website that a "complete renovation" was scheduled for winter 2008.
reviews.title: An Excellent Stay!

likes.disliked: — Low flow showerhead was REALLY low flow

reviews.text: Have to say I have never stayed at a hotel where the staff was so friendly. Everyone was so kind and seemed genuinely concerned about the quality of my stay. The room was spotless and the bed super comfortable. The interior of the rooms didn't appear to be remodeled (decor a bit dated looking) but was in excellent condition.
reviews.title: great hotel

likes.disliked: — No full stove in the room

reviews.text: Hotel takes the breakfast and the reception/dinner seriously and staff was always replenishing food and making sure the area was neat. Considering you can stay here and eat breakfast and dinner for free it turns into a good value.
reviews.title: Nice, convenient and clean.

likes.liked: — Good complimentary breakfast, clean and comfortable
likes.disliked: — Toilet didn't work properly, windows were dirty

reviews.text: Overall I was surprised at how nice the hotel was, the numerous amenitities and the professionalism of the staff. I would highly recommend this hotel as I had a great experience.
reviews.title: Needs a Major Makeover!

reviews.text: I stayed overnight on the way to Savannah. I was with my mom and dog. I needed the first floor due to height issues. Marriott has always worked with us for the first floor. Great customer service and great as usual. The front desk clerk told us where the closest place to get a meal was. The breakfast in the morning was nice.
reviews.title: Wonderful Place to Stay

reviews.text: This hotel is in a great location - easy to get on Butler (202) to head to the Beach or shopping atthe fabulous St John's Town Center. Very quiet with very little road noise. Adjacent to a very nice city library.
reviews.title: Good location, So-so hotel

reviews.text: The scrambled eggs & bacon served with the hot breakfast were tasty and replenished often. High speed connection was very good. Full size fridge was nice.
reviews.title: Great Place...

reviews.text: That being said, it did not live up to what I've experienced at other Residence Inns. The couch & coffee table were outdated, flimsy, and uncomfortable. Bathroom counter very small, carpet could use replacing and my non-smoking room and the hallway smelled of musty cigarettes. Very problematic and small closet door and closet- ie.. you had to shut the bathroom door entirely to coax the sliding closet door open- it was very flimsy and did not slide smoothly.
reviews.title: Great for relaxation and easy access to major routes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - The wireless internet is very slow
reviews.title: Could be better....

reviews.text: - Do not get a room that faces the pool if you like peace and quiet. People tend to congregate around the pool in the evening for the nightly socials
reviews.title: Does not live up to Marriott standards

reviews.text: - The location is very convenient to the St. John Town Center shopping area
reviews.title: Nice Place

reviews.text: Traveling for business, I stayed at this hotel over 20 times for about 50 total nights (not by choice) over a 9 month period. While the staff is amazing, caring, attentive, and will bend over backwards for you, the hotel is in desperate need of renovation. EVERY room has at least one loose fixture just dangling in the wall, the beds are rock hard with flat pillows, televisions are at least 15 years old, and connecting to the "high speed" internet access sometimes makes you wish you had a dial up account so you could get work done. Given that the breakfast and happy hour are included for free, one cannot complain about them. Free beer is definitely a plus. There are much nicer hotels in the area that now have competitive rates.
reviews.title: Delightful Experience, Excellent Value

reviews.text: Very nice hotel for the price. 5 minutes down the road is a huge shopping center and its also fairly close to the beach. The breakfast was a little weak, but overall not bad. Single room was huge with good air flow
reviews.title: No thanks.

aka: Residence Inn Jacksonville Butler Boulevard Hotel
description: Discover the Residence Inn by Marriott Jacksonville hotel - a member of the Florida Green Lodging Program - providing spacious one- and two-bedroom hotel suites designed for the extended-stay traveler. Enjoy the most comfortable accommodations among Jacksonville hotels, featuring fully-equipped kitchens with a full-size refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, stove-top, cookware, utensils and dishwasher. Start your day right with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet featuring healthy options plus grab-and-go items, and unwind during the Manager's reception Tuesday-Thursday nights. Enjoy a relaxing swim in the heated outdoor pool and Jacuzzi or an invigorating game of basketball or volleyball on the SportCourt at our extended stay hotel in Jacksonville. Just minutes from our extended stay Jacksonville hotel is Deerwood Park, St John's Town Center Mall, the Mayo Clinic, St Luke's, the University of North Florida, Jacksonville University, Downtown Jacksonville and the beach.
